titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to establish a demonstration program to adapt the successful practices of providing foreign aid to underdeveloped economies to the provision of Federal economic development assistance to Native communities in similarly situated remote areas in the United States, and for other purposes.
Native American Millennium Challenge Demonstration Act
Native American Millennium Challenge Demonstration Act
Native American Millennium Challenge Demonstration Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
